rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Open space near the entrance with Vastu alignment ensuring a welcoming environment.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area adjacent to the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Functional space with seating arrangement aligned per Vastu directions.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact kitchen placed in the south-west corner for fire safety and optimal energy flow.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Storage space for cleaning utilities located conveniently near the kitchen.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment
rooms.description: Two-story studio apartment with a bedroom and living area combined, designed for flexible use while ensuring ample natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Private sleeping area adjacent to the studio apartment for enhanced privacy and quietness.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom placed close to bedroom for convenience.

rooms.name: Closet/Study
rooms.description: Multipurpose space serving as a closet and study area.

openings.description: Access to a small balcony facing the courtyard.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage with storage space and easy access to the main entrance.
